de.domain.games.dialog

Class Dialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.domain.games.dialog.Dialog

  • public class Dialog
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the dialog class of the application. It initializes the application, sets the UI components and builds the applications components
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tim Schmitz
    See Also:
    Property, Builder
